ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Tomato Soup (Regular or 25% Less Sodium)
8 Pepperidge Farm® Classic Sandwich Buns with Sesame Seeds

cookingTips: Brown the ground beef thoroughly and drain excess fat before adding soup and salsa for better flavor and texture
Warm the buns in a low oven or toaster before serving to prevent them from getting soggy
Top with extra cheese and salsa after filling the buns for additional flavor and presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through browning the ground beef, combining it with tomato soup and salsa, and assembling the taco joes on toasted buns with cheese.
